DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine whether Fiberoptic Endoscopic Evaluation Swallowing ( FEES ) effective detect laryngeal penetration tracheal aspiration compare Videofluoroscopic Swallowing Study ( VFSS ) bottle-feeding infant NICU . A secondary objective determine whether FEES use detect laryngeal penetration tracheal aspiration breastfeed NICU infant .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing FEES VFSS Diagnosing Laryngeal Penetration Aspiration Infants NICU
DOC.criteria: 37 week postmenstrual age Diagnosis suspicion laryngeal penetration and/or tracheal aspiration neonatal therapist and/or physician Inpatient Baylor University Medical Center NICU Not medically stable enough undergo FEES VFSS determine neonatal therapist and/or physician Bilateral complete cleft lip palate
